source:
TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Hastelot is in over his head.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
ライト村のハステロットは、助けを必要としているようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_TODO_00<tab>Investigate the trail of scattered grain east of Wright.
target: TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_TODO_00<tab>ライト村の東で<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAC8E01 /var>を調べる

source: TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_TODO_01<tab>Investigate the trail of scattered grain west of the Chisel.
target: TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_TODO_01<tab>チゼルの岩門の西で<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAC8F01 /var>を調べる

source: TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_TODO_02<tab>Confront the former Eulmoran soldier and defeat the bandits.
target: TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_TODO_02<tab>ゲートタウンの北西で元ユールモア軍の兵士と話し襲われたら討伐

source: TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_000<tab>I'm sorry, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>...? Please tell me you're a warrior of some kind...
target: TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_000<tab>旅の方……話を聞いてくださるのですか？

source: TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_001<tab>You see, there's a gang of bandits who've moved into the area. They used to be residents of Eulmore, but were exiled for stealing from free citizens.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_001<tab>実は、市民から盗みを働いた罪で、
ユールモアを追放された輩がいるのですが……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_002<tab>Now they've taken to stealing from us instead. And anyone who tries to stand up to them gets a good beating for their trouble...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_002<tab>かなり素行が悪く、この村にまで強盗をしかけてくるのです。
抵抗しようとした村人が、怪我を負う始末で……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_003<tab>Folk say they're former soldiers, and seeing how those bastards fight, I'm inclined to believe them.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_003<tab>奴らはユールモア軍の所属だったためにやたらと強く、
その上、数人で徒党を組んでいるせいで、
我々では手に負えないのです……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_004<tab>We're just farmers here! We need someone who can stand up to them─someone who knows their way around a weapon! Could you be that person for us...?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_004<tab>お願いです！
代わりに懲らしめていただけないでしょうか？
このままでは……気の休まるときがなくて……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_005<tab>You'll teach them a lesson, then!? Oh, thank you!
target: TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_005<tab>あぁ、ありがとうございます……！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_006<tab>We've already hatched a plan to track down their camp─poked a hole in a harvest sack and left it as bait. There's a trail of grain now, leading away from the village to the east, so you might want to start your search there.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_006<tab>実は、いつも東に去っていく奴らの根城を突き止めるため、
差し出した穀物袋のひとつに、穴を空けておきました。
「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAC8E01 /var>」を辿れば、追跡できるはずです！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_007<tab>Head out to the east and look for the trail of grain─it should lead you right to their camp.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_007<tab>実は、いつも東に去っていく奴らの根城を突き止めるため、
差し出した穀物袋のひとつに、穴を空けておきました。
「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EAC8E01 /var>」を辿れば、追跡できるはずです！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>The trail of grain continues to the east...
target: TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>穀物は、東の方角に続いているようだ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>The trail of grain takes a sharp turn to the south...
target: TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>穀物は、さらに南の方角に続いているようだ……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_SOLDIER03357_000_030<tab>Bah, we've got us a sneaky rat, boys! Better grab it by the tail afore it squeaks to its mates!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_SOLDIER03357_000_030<tab>チッ……付けられたか！
生きて帰れると思うなよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_040<tab>You...took care of them? I can hardly believe it!
target: TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_040<tab>ありがとうございます……なんとお礼を言ったらよいか……！

source: TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_041<tab>We work long and hard for the food we harvest, and to have it all snatched away by those brutes...
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_041<tab>せっかく苦労して収穫した作物を、
暴力で奪われてしまっては生きていけません……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_042<tab>You'd think with all that training and discipline they'd have an easy time adjusting to an honest life in the field. But I suppose some men are cruel by nature.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_042<tab>連中も、あれだけの力があるのなら、
真面目に畑を耕して暮らしてくれればいいのに……。

source: TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_043<tab>At least there are good people like you still around to renew my faith in the world. You have our thanks!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZA015_03357_HASTELOT_000_043<tab>しかし、あなたのように人助けをしてくださる方もいるので、
まだまだこの世も捨てたもんじゃないかもしれませんね！
本当に、ありがとうございました！
